name: water-absorb

effect.black-white: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it. Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.
effect.black-2-white-2: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it. Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

short_effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.black-white: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
